product_description: Feel confident in and out of class in cropped leggings made from signature Airlift, a double-knit performance fabric that lifts, sculpts and smooths.
product_details_and_care:
Feel confident in and out of class in cropped leggings made from signature Airlift, a double-knit performance fabric that lifts, sculpts and smooths. A logo-debossed high waistband and hidden tummy-smoothing panel flatter while keeping you comfortable and supported through workouts.
21" inseam; 9" leg opening; 10 1/2" front rise; 13" back rise (size Medium)
Elastic waist
Moisture-wicking fabric engineered for dryness and comfort
Antimicrobial fabric engineered to inhibit the growth of odor-causing germs
84% polyester, 16% spandex
Hand wash, dry flat
Imported
Women's Clothing
Item #6093623
